contents.paragraph: The Enchanted Kingdom (EK) is the largest and popular theme park in the Philipines. The theme park area is about 25 hectares (62 acres), and it is big enough to accommodate thousands of tourists. The theme park was founded by Mario and Cynthia Mamon - a family who frequently visit local theme parks in the Philipines. There were a lot of rides to choose from, a roller-coster to splashy (wet) rides.

contents.headingText: Re opens for the holiday season!
contents.paragraph: At last! After a long wait of many people, they can now enjoy the theme park after nearly two years. The reopening has excited many people and also the media outlets. Thanks to nationwide vaccination and people helping the government to reduce the numbers of Covid-19 cases in the country.

Enchanted Kingdom has announced that the "visiting guests must have no underlying conditions (e.g. immunodeficiency, comorbidity, or other health risks and pregnant women) in accordance with our current operational guidelines set by the IATF." Also, the guest must be FULLY VACCINATED in order to enter. Safety protocols are implemented in the theme park. Children may enter the theme park EXCEPT for less than 2 yrs old*. Wearing a facemask is a must at all times. It still recommends that you book on their official website.
